# Learning `readxl`


We are working with datain readxl and it's going to be amazing

Using the the following packages

- tidyverse
- readxl
- writexl
- here


```{r packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(writexl)
library(here)
```

### Read in Fish Counts

```{r readCVS}
### Read in fish_counts_curated.csv 
fish_counts <- read_csv(here("R-workshop-data","fish_counts_curated.csv"))
```
